items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So flattering!
items.body: Bought this dress for a work even and I'm amazed with the quality and how flattering it is. The material is really nice and has some stretch to it. It's not too short and it's so comfortable. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like Butter
items.body: The color is like butter, love this dress against my complexion. The size I ordered fit, as I am 5'5 and 180 pounds and the dress fit perfectly. It did NOT run small for me. Love the color and the length of the dress! Read more
items.author: Toy Bongiovano

items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Had potential but not flattering at all
items.body: This style has potential and I LOVEEE a classic, simple, figure hugging black dress - but this just doesn't do it for me. For reference I am 5'2 about 135 lbs and ordered the Medium in black. This was the right size. Small would have been too small and large would have been too big. I have a pretty good shape to my body (smaller waist, observable butt, flat tummy) - but you'd never know it when I put this dress on. Somehow it undoes all of that. I will say I enjoy the mock neck and sleeves, there is something about being covered up top in a form fitting black dress that is so sexy. The bottom is yikes. Usually ruching a snug fit bodycon dress enhance shape and hide flaws, but this somehow takes away from it and magnifies imperfections. It is NOT forgiving. In fact kind of insulting. If you have any sort of hip dip or non flat surface it will magnify it. Heck it would probably show if you had a bandaid on. The ruching can be adjusted along with the length - you can pull it longer to the knees and have almost no ruching, or make it shorter and there will be more ruching. The ruching sits oddly - it all seems to be focused between the bottom of the bust and right above the waist. It doesn't hit where you need it and want to be in order to be flattering. I will say it is comfortable and it doesn't cut into my legs on the bottom. It would also be an easy dress to roll up and pack and travel with. I think it has potential to wear under a longer length cardigan or sweater (that's just not my style). I think you can find better. I love this kind of style when done right, which this is not. Read more
items.author: CLCS28

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fitting was perfect
items.author: Samir Desai

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: Super cute fitted dress. This dress fits so well. It looks so great too. It is so flattering in every way possible. The material is stretchy enough and extremely comfortable. Besides looking really good in this dress, the color is very versatile and can be worn for various occasions. Read more
items.author: Marcela j rodriguez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy so size down
items.body: This dress is made of nice quality fabric that's very stretchy. If you want it to be truly bodycon, though, you should probably size down. The length is also quite a bit longer than the photos. Read more
items.author: Kari

short_description:
Womens Dress Ruched Sleeveless Cocktail Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Ruched Sleeveless Cocktail Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Wine Red, White, Purple, Yellow, Apricot, Army Green, Hot Pink, Light Green, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
